2000

Karen Baker Landers

The Bourne

Ultimatum (2008)

Skyfall (2013)

Nina Hartstone

Bohemian Rhapsody (2019)

Michelle Couttolenc

Sound of Metal (2021)

2021

Karen Baker Landers

The sound editor has been nominated

to two awards through her whole career

and winning both of them.

They were The Bourne Ultimatum (2008)

and Skyfall (2013). Both awards were

shared with also sound editor

Per Hallberg.

Nina Hartstone

She won Best Sound Editing in 2019

for Bohemian Rhapsody, along with

John Warhurst. She has since not

received any other nomination

in this category.

Michelle Couttolenc

The sound engineer won the

award for Best Sound in 2021

for the movie The Sound of Metal,

along with Nicolas Becker,

Jaime Baksht, Carlos Cortés and

Phillip Bladh.
